Title: Empty Days
Writer: Santiago Amigorena, Gaëlle Macé, Marc Syrigas, Marion Vernoux
Actors: Valeria Bruni Tedeschi, Patrick Dell'Isola, Sergi López, Florence Thomassin
Plot: An executive and a dowdy working-class woman, both unemployed, married and parents meet at a supermarket. They become friends but find it hard to accept that they may be in love with each other.
